text: Anɨgɨl ag mɨdel mɨdel, taun Epesus bɨawl ñu kɨl tɨkep kɨli ak, ne tɨkjakɨl kɨlop agak, Kɨmɨgel mɨdem agak. Anɨb agek, kɨmɨgel yelaknɨŋ agak, Epesus binɨb. Taun chɨn awl, bin awl Atemis kab ne gap tek wɨsɨp alaŋ nɨb ju yowak agak. Kab anɨb ak dɨl, kal gɨlɨtep gɨl agnopun ak, an ma nɨgup agɨl, takaw pug awl ak agebɨm agak?
